movies.title: Pablo Francisco: Bits and Pieces - Live from Orange County
movies.plot: Filmed in the O.C., the show features explosive material that tears apart everything from love songs and psycho chicks to Viagra and American Justice. With his uncanny talent for creating vivid images using strikingly authentic, off-the-wall sound effects, Pablo keeps the laughs coming.
movies.simplePlot: Filmed in the O.C., the show features explosive material that tears apart everything from love songs and psycho chicks to Viagra and American Justice. With his uncanny talent for creating ...

biography.bio: Pablo Francisco was born on January 5, 1974 as Pablo Ridson Francisco. He is a writer and actor, known for The Three Amigos (2003), They Put It Out There (2011) and Pablo Francisco: Bits and Pieces - Live from Orange County (2004).
biography.name: Pablo Francisco

filmingLocations.location: Irvine Improv - Irvine Spectrum Center, 527 Spectrum Center Drive, Irvine, California, USA
